availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Chiswell D. Gooch (Madison County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Maupin Gooch in Madison County, Kentucky, on February 18, 1830. Father of Cornelius Gooch, Argelia Gooch, Thomas Gooch, Nancy Gooch, Remus Gooch, Mary Gooch, Henry Gooch, Joann Gooch, Sashel Gooch, Laura Gooch, John Gooch, Lucy Gooch, James Gooch, and William Gooch. Farmer in Madison County in 1850. Farmer in Madison County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Madison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, District 1, p. 213B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Division 1, p. 281.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Division 1, p. 447A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Madison County Marriages, Film 000183302, p. 175.
